name: Project 2247
description:
It's sometime in the future and a group of terrorist controlled machines have taken control of a floor of a building under construction in the middle of the city. What they plan on doing is uncertain, but whatever it is will happen in 45 seconds and there are 20 of them. They can't send in humans so they find it prime time to try out their newest project. An advanced robot that could be capable of this. 

This Project is you. Try to kill 20 enemies as fast as you can without dying. After many failures which are inevitable, you will be able to get an upgrade, a new evolution. Try to get your best time.  

Controls --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WASD - Movement 

LMB - Shoot

SPACE - Jump

R - Reload

LCTRL - Slide

X - Slow Motion

G - Impact Grenades

1 - Rifle

2 - Pistol

LSHIFT - Dash

A lot of these are needed to be unlocked.  (the controls are also in the menu if you forget)
